major_events: Dragon crisis has been resolved - Alduin defeated
Civil war between Imperials and Stormcloaks continues
High King Torygg was killed by Ulfric Stormcloak
Thalmor influence in Skyrim grows stronger

post_dragon_crisis.timeline_note: Alduin has been defeated, remaining dragons are scattered
post_dragon_crisis.helgen_status: Ruins remain, rebuilding has not begun
post_dragon_crisis.dragon_knowledge: Common knowledge that dragons returned but were dealt with

rumors_and_news: The dragon threat has passed, but Skyrim remains divided
Helgen ruins stand as reminder of the dragon crisis
Jarl Balgruuf refuses to take sides in the civil war
Thalmor Justiciars are becoming more aggressive
Bandits are becoming bolder on the roads
notes: Post-Alduin timeline: The dragon crisis has been resolved, but Skyrim remains divided by civil war. The Thalmor work behind the scenes to keep both sides weak. Jarls are being forced to choose sides, and the common people are caught in the middle.
